sentences.en: Check up the weight indicator, and inject transmission oil when necessary.
sentences.cn: 检查指重表, 必要时应加注传动油.

sentences.en: He needs to inject himself once a month.
sentences.cn: 他需要每月为自己打一针。

sentences.en: His son was injected with strong drugs.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子被注射了强效的药。

sentences.en: Inject infinite energy to the skin, experience new life energy!
sentences.cn: 为肌肤注入无穷活力, 体现新锐生活能量!

sentences.en: Is the move factor that inject uses intramuscular injection or hypodermic?
sentences.cn: 注射用的转移因子是肌肉注射还是皮下注射?

sentences.en: It has also announced measures to inject liquidity into the financial system.
sentences.cn: 美联储还宣布了对金融体系注入流动性的措施.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To investigate the anti - adherence effect and its mechanism of Xingnaojing ( XNJ ) inject ˉ tion .
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究醒脑静注射液的 抗 粘附 效果及机理.

sentences.en: Once the product is launched after installation, the key will auto - inject.
sentences.cn: 当软件在安装后启动时, 密钥将自动注入.

sentences.en: She kept trying to inject a little fun into their relationship.
sentences.cn: 她一直在设法为他们的关系增添一些情趣。

sentences.en: So love is inject loyal observant valiant enjoyment yes obligation and unison.
sentences.cn: 所以,爱就是投入,忠诚,用心,勇敢,喜悦,愿意,责任还有和谐.

sentences.en: The mosquito will suck our blood. What's even worse, it will inject poison into our bodies.
sentences.cn: 蚊子会吸我们的血. 更糟的是, 它会把毒注入我们的体内.

sentences.en: They will expect to see you inject cash into your new business.
sentences.cn: 同样,他们也期望你投入资金到你的生意中.

sentences.en: Traditional handbag makers are injecting more fun into their designs.
sentences.cn: 传统的手袋制作者在他们的设计中注入了更多有趣的元素。

sentences.en: Try to inject a bit of enthusiasm into your performance.
sentences.cn: 你要尽力在演出中倾注一点热情.

sentences.en: We continuously inject a tracer into a point in a steadily moving fluid.
sentences.cn: 我们连续地将一种示踪物注入某稳定运动流体中之一点.

sentences.en: We inject guinea pigs or rabbits with enkephalins that are chemically coupled to large proteins.
sentences.cn: 我们将脑素和大分子蛋白质从化学上结合起来,把它注射给豚鼠或兔.

sentences.en: What effect does element of heart inject belladonna have?
sentences.cn: 心脏注射颠茄素有什么作用?

words.tran_cn: 注射；注射剂；充血；射入轨道

trans.tran_en: to put liquid, especially a drug, into someone’s body by using a special needle

trans.tran_cn: （给…）注射（药物等），（给…）注射（液体），（给…）添加，（给…）投入（资金）
trans.tran_en: to put liquid, especially a drug, into someone’s body by using a special needle
